thread.title: Photos: Prayer session for Buhari in Kano, Kebi
thread.title_full: Photos: Prayer session for Buhari in Kano, Kebi

author: adekunle
title: Photos: Prayer session for Buhari in Kano, Kebi
text:
The Kano State government Wednesday organised a prayer session President Muhammadu Buhari and during the prayer session President Muhammadu Buhari spoke with Governor of Kano State, Dr. Abdullahi Umar Ganduje on Phone. 
Also Kebbi State Government held another prayer for President Muhammadu Buhari in Birnin-Kebb on Thursday. Governor of Kano State, Dr. Abdullahi Umar Ganduje on Phone with President Muhammadu Buhari, during the prayer session organised Kano State Government for President on Wednesday in Kano. Governor of Kano State, Dr. Abdullahi Umar Ganduje (middle), His Deputy, Professor Hafiz Abubakar (2nd right) and APC Chieftain, Hon. Gali Naabba, during the prayer session organised Kano State Government for President on Wednesday in Kano KEBBI STATE GOVERNMENT HOLDS PRAYER FOR PRESIDENT MUHAMMADU BUHARI IN BIRNIN KEBB KEBBI STATE GOVERNMENT HOLDS PRAYER FOR PRESIDENT MUHAMMADU BUHARI IN BIRNIN KEBBI adekunle
